actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill entitled the "Eximbank Capital Restoration Act of 1986."
subjects: Export-Import Bank of the United States

summary.text: Eximbank Capital Restoration Act of 1986 - Amends the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to require the Export-Import Bank to maintain a specified minimum level of capital stock and retained earnings. Authorizes appropriations. Requires the Export-Import Bank to estimate an allowance for loan losses and deduct that amount from revenues and assets.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "Eximbank Capital Restoration Act of 1986."
